scripts.dev: rm -rf ./public && mkdir public && cp ./src/manifest.json ./public/manifest.json && cp -r ./assets ./public/ && NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee server.coffee
scripts.buildDev: rm -rf ./public && mkdir public && cp ./src/manifest.json ./public/manifest.json && cp -r ./assets ./public/ && NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js
scripts.build: rm -rf ./public && mkdir public && cp ./src/manifest.json ./public/manifest.json && cp -r ./assets ./public/ && NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js -p
